Reviews.Title: Apple iPhone 5 64gb ATT White
Reviews.Author: Joseph Lee
Reviews.Content: I bought 2 from H@N store and I unlocked them for use with t-mobile :) ATT unlocks them if you paid in full for the iPhone

Reviews.Title: Nice phone
Reviews.Author: Hammondagyei
Reviews.Content: Great phone the provides all the services I expect. Am happy to have it. Works great but will have to unlock it so I can use it on my service provider. Thanks

Reviews.Title: The best item I bought form Amazon
Reviews.Author: Mustafa
Reviews.Content: WoooooooooOoooooooooOoooooooooWActually, this was just a gift. I did like it. It came before the expected date.  The description were exactly as mentioned; moreover, I could barely believe that this product is second hand.  It was a flawless product  For a good price.If there were a 6th star, I certainly would rate it.Happy with. :D

Reviews.Title: Battery problems
Reviews.Author: mc "m"
Reviews.Content: Phone randomly shuts off when battery still has juice, of course I'm just 3 weeks outside of warranty, and Apple had no sympathy. I have a few friends who have the same phone and 2 others have told me they have the same issue. The power button was finicky and wouldnt work sometimes. Spending over $400 on a phone, I'd expect it to at least last though the 2 year contract. Not meeting my quality expecations.

Reviews.Title: not so good
Reviews.Author: chouriver
Reviews.Content: There are a lot of black spots on the top of the phone,and scratches on the aluminum casing,not so good~
